title: A totaled Tesla was sold for parts in the US but came back online in the Ukraine — here’s what happened
description: The car or its computer was suddenly online in a Southern region of war-torn Ukraine.

title: Trump's Truth Social tipped FBI to man killed during arrest attempt for Biden threats
description: The FBI fatally shot Craig Deleeuw Robertson in Provo, Utah, while trying to arrest him for making threats to President Joe Biden and Manhattan DA Alvin Bragg.

title: Tech investors face 'new era' of China restrictions after Biden order limits funding in A.I., chips
description: Following President Biden's executive order to limit tech investments in China, venture capitalists will have even less exposure to the world's No. 2 economy.

title: Hawaii wildfires: Biden vows immediate aid, deploys military to assist victims
description: Biden declared a major disaster in Hawaii two days after wildfires rapidly swept across parts of Maui, devastating the historic city of Lahaina.

title: Biden seeks nearly $40 billion in funding for Ukraine, disaster relief and border
description: The White House wants nearly $40 billion in supplemental funding to boost Ukraine's capabilities, respond to natural disasters and manage the border.

title: Record hot ocean temps could turbocharge the hurricane season, says NOAA
description: There's a 60% chance this year will have above-normal hurricane activity, according to the agency.

title: Stop searching for 'the next Warren Buffett' — The 'Oracle of Omaha' is impossible to copy
description: Buffett took control of Berkshire in 1965 — and the conglomerate is now more successful than ever.

title: Virgin Galactic flies tourists to space for the first time
description: Virgin Galactic flew its second commercial spaceflight on Thursday, its first carrying private-paying tourists.

title: Why insider trading is so difficult to stop
description: Insider trading cases are difficult to prove because of the legal gray area and the high threshold for proof regarding proof of intent.

title: X Corp. CEO Linda Yaccarino says she has 'autonomy' under Elon Musk
Inflation gauge rose 3.2% annually in July, less than expected
description: The consumer price index in July was expected to rise 0.2% from the prior month and 3.3% from a year ago, according to Dow Jones.

title: SMIC posted a drop in second-quarter revenue on persisting weak chip demand
description: SMCIC posted a drop in second-quarter revenue amid ongoing U.S. sanctions and a sluggish recovery in global chip demand.

title: European gas prices jumped nearly 40% on Australia supply fears — and analysts expect further rises
description: Energy analysts believe the bullish momentum for European natural gas prices will persist over the coming months.

title: Alibaba reports solid earnings beat, revenue up 14% year-on-year
description: Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba on Thursday reported revenue grew by 14% year-on-year in the quarter ended June 30.

title: Interest rates should stay around 5% for longer — even as inflation falls, top economist Jim O'Neill says
description: Veteran economist Jim O'Neill says central banks will need to keep interest rates up around 5% across major economies for longer than the market expects, even as inflation subsides.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Inflation, earnings and the American consumer
description: Americans are being very careful where and how they are spending their money in an age of rising prices.

title: Wegovy-maker Novo Nordisk sales soar 30% on strong demand for its weight-loss drug
description: The Danish company's diabetes and obesity division performed particularly well, bolstered by interest in its blockbuster injections Wegovy and Ozempic.

title: China lifts ban on group travel to more than 70 locations, giving a boost to travel stocks
description: This will be the first time in six years that China would allow group tours to South Korea.

title: The average Manhattan rent just hit a new record of $5,588 a month
description: Rents in Manhattan hit a new high in July, as higher interest rates and low supply continued to drive up prices.

title: China slams Biden's order limiting U.S. overseas tech investment
description: "This seriously deviates from the market economy and fair competition principles that the U.S. has always advocated," the Chinese Ministry of Commerce said.

title: Global rice prices surge close to 12-year highs, and could rise even more
description: Rice prices surged to their highest in almost 12 years, said the United Nations' food agency.

title: Cat-sitting to save on travel costs? I looked after 5 and got a free place in Spain for two weeks
description: Cat-sitting in Mallorca, Spain, allowed me to live like a local, exploring the island's beaches, mountains and food. I even borrowed the cat-owner's car.

title: China's real estate market roiled by default fears again
description: Two years after Evergrande's debt troubles, worries about China's real estate sector are coming to the forefront again.
